article_title: Spot-on Mistake at TSA; Duped by Obama

article_metadata.description: Spot-on Mistake at TSA In 2007, when the TSA launched program in an effort to find terrorists by observing travelers’ body language, mannerisms and facial expressions, it sounded like an idea worth trying. But after nearly seven years, the program called SPOT (Screening of Passengers by Observation Technique) has failed [...]
